name: Import Stops From OpenStreetMap
description: Download all stops within a range centered on a lat-lon coordinate, and output a STOPS format.

params.name: Radius
params.help: Radius in meters, centered on (lat, lon), within which to get bus stops

params.name: Latitude
params.help: Latitude of coordinate around which to look for bus stops

params.name: Longitude
params.help: Longitude of coordinate around which to look for bus stops

outputStageFormats.name: Stops
outputStageFormats.help: A json file containing the generated stops
